sn22.21:4.3: Atha kho āyasmā ānando yena bhagavā tenupasaṅkami;
sn22.21:4.5: Ekamantaṃ nisinno kho āyasmā ānando bhagavantaṃ etadavoca:
sn22.21:4.7: Katamesānaṃ kho, bhante, dhammānaṃ nirodho ‘nirodho’ti vuccatī”ti?
sn22.21:4.8: “Rūpaṃ kho, ānanda, aniccaṃ saṅkhataṃ paṭiccasamuppannaṃ khayadhammaṃ vayadhammaṃ virāgadhammaṃ nirodhadhammaṃ.
sn22.21:4.9: Tassa nirodho ‘nirodho’ti vuccati.
sn22.21:4.10: Vedanā aniccā saṅkhatā paṭiccasamuppannā khayadhammā vayadhammā virāgadhammā nirodhadhammā.
sn22.21:4.13: saṅkhārā aniccā saṅkhatā paṭiccasamuppannā khayadhammā vayadhammā virāgadhammā nirodhadhammā.
sn22.21:4.15: Viññāṇaṃ aniccaṃ saṅkhataṃ paṭiccasamuppannaṃ khayadhammaṃ vayadhammaṃ virāgadhammaṃ nirodhadhammaṃ.
sn22.21:4.17: Imesaṃ kho, ānanda, dhammānaṃ nirodho ‘nirodho’ti vuccatī”ti.
